trans-unit.source: Specifies that, when interpreting <xref href="System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmapAttribute"></xref> declarations, the assembly should look for the indicated resources in a satellite assembly, but with the <xref:System.Drawing.Configuration.SystemDrawingSection.BitmapSuffix*> configuration value appended to the declared file name.
trans-unit.target: Specifica che, quando si interpretano <xref href="System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmapAttribute"> </xref> dichiarazioni, l'assembly deve cercare risorse indicate in un assembly satellite, ma con la <xref:System.Drawing.Configuration.SystemDrawingSection.BitmapSuffix*>il valore di configurazione aggiunto al nome del file dichiarati.</xref:System.Drawing.Configuration.SystemDrawingSection.BitmapSuffix*>

trans-unit.source: The bitmap suffix is appended to the file name before the extension.
trans-unit.target: Il suffisso bitmap viene aggiunto al nome del file prima dell'estensione.

trans-unit.source: For example, with a bitmap suffix of ".test.1.0", a <xref:System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmapAttribute> reference to "my.bmp" is interpreted as "my.test.1.0.bmp".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, con il suffisso bitmap ". test.1.0", un <xref:System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmapAttribute>riferimento a "my.bmp" viene interpretato come "my.test.1.0.bmp".</xref:System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmapAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.BitmapSuffixInSatelliteAssemblyAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Drawing.BitmapSuffixInSatelliteAssemblyAttribute"> </xref> classe.
